Ranger: Leading the Way

Designed to lead the way, The Ranger is at the forefront of theme design. It’s bold, powerful, and robust and will take your blog to another level.


Purchase – $9.00


Features

Fully Responsive
Mobile-friendly design
Optimized for performance & fast load times
High-resolution images supported
Cross-browser & mobile support
Ghost v0.4 - v0.5 Support
Ghost.org support
Disqus comment support
Youtube / Vimeo video embed support
Soundcloud embed support
Social Media profile support
Documentation included

Requirements

Ghost v0.4 or later or ghost.org account
